extendedInfo.description: The official app for BURGER KINGÂ® restaurants is finally here â Get rewarded for all your BURGER KINGÂ® purchases with special offers, while you earn rewards for FREE food and drinks. Currently the functions are only available in the Baltimore area. With this app, earn BKâ  Crowns for each dollar you spend, which can be used towards BURGER KINGÂ® food and drink items, like the WHOPPERÂ® sandwich or our special frappÃ©s and smoothies. You will receive ongoing special coupons designed just for you. With this app, you can even upload and pay for your BURGER KINGÂ® purchases with your BKÂ® Crown Card, which makes paying wallet-free and hassle-free. We even made it easy to find your closest BURGER KINGÂ® restaurant. Specific features include:My Rewards Eat at BURGER KINGÂ® restaurants and get rewarded. When you register, we start you off with 50 BKâ  Crowns- good for one WHOPPERÂ® sandwich or any other individual item on the menu.  Then, earn one BKâ  Crown for every one dollar you spend. 25 BKâ  Crowns earns you any small beverage on the menu, including smoothies and frappÃ©s; 50 BKâ  Crowns earns you any individual item on the menu; 75 BKâ  Crowns earns you any sized combo meal. Keep track of all the BKâ  Crowns rewards you have earned for free food and drinks. And if you pay with your BKÂ® Crown Card â you earn 20% more BKâ  Crowns!  OffersDonât miss out on more ways with save with customized BURGER KINGÂ® coupons, which youâll receive once you register. All of your offers are stored in one easy location.LocationWhen you're craving BURGER KINGÂ® food, we've got the place.  The Restaurant Locator function makes finding a BURGER KINGÂ® restaurant in your area quick and easy. Use list-view or map-view searching, and filter by distance within a 1, 5 or 20 mile radius.WalletAdd a BKÂ® Crown Card to make paying even easier, wallet-free and right from the app. Additionally, store multiple cards and manage your cards -including view balances and easily reload funds. And when you pay using your stored BKÂ® Crown Card, youâll earn 20% bonus BKâ  Crowns.

reviews.comment: I live this app.when I go to burger kibg the cashiers do not know how to use this and handed me a rewards card to use instead why have yhe app.if your employees don\'t know how to use? Other than that its wonderful.
reviews.author: Sandra Cole

reviews.title: I wish I could give this NO stars...
reviews.comment: Don\'t waste your time. Great concept, but I was given the card by a cashier at Orleans Street location in Baltimore. But the cashiers at that same location have no idea how to use the pay with card feature (cash on card instead of points). A shift supervisor told me the card couldn\'t have cash on it, that she had been working there for four years, does this every day, and when I tried to show her the app, brushed me off. I left without food & called the support line. I want my remaining balance back.
reviews.author: Bonnie M. Muschett

reviews.title: No menu for ordering
reviews.comment: I wish this app cone with a menu for ordering food you think they would have figure that out
reviews.author: Mitchell Justice

reviews.title: User from baltimore
reviews.comment: Great app
reviews.author: James Winterstein

reviews.title: Good, but...
reviews.comment: I\'m aware it\'s only in Baltimore area but why not the entire area? I\'m in Baltimore Co. and the closest one to me is about 4 miles out of the way but there\'s a BK half a mile around the corner. Please post something on the website so we\'ll know which zip codes or areas are next and what the estimated time frames are.
reviews.author: Gretchen Whitaker

reviews.title: Works it really does...
reviews.comment: This app only works in the Baltimore area because..... they are the test market! Please don\'t whine and complain about other areas. Leave it installed and it will notify you when it is available in your location. To the users that complain about losing points.. if you don\'t use your points right away hit the little x on the coupon and points will be refunded to your account
reviews.author: Patrick Ignaczak

reviews.title: What more can you ask for
reviews.comment: This is a great concept. I mean what more can you ask for? I regularly stop by BK and now I can earn points to redeem for free food. I\'ve already took advantage of the free combo meal, that alone saved me a little over $10.
reviews.author: James Mayhew

reviews.title: Doesn\'t say only for Baltimore
reviews.comment: I read the whole description, nowhere does it say only for Baltimore area, Don\'t buy gift virtual gift cards won\'t work. Terrible support information.
reviews.author: Stephan Shaffer

reviews.title: unfinished app
reviews.comment: like the idea but unable to use in califorina ..... need to exspand
reviews.author: Garret Clark

reviews.title: Crap application. Deserve 0 stars.
reviews.comment: Don\'t provide the locations!!!   Buy a good app.  Please google play.  Delete that it.
reviews.author: Luis Pereira

reviews.title: Manager
reviews.comment: Im aphone store manager in north carolina we will soon be everywhere. Patience is key its a new adventure for us!!!
reviews.author: Jeremy Gendreau

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Love it!
reviews.author: Sharon Lowe

reviews.title: Sucks!#
reviews.comment: I tried to use and store mgr was like....wtf is that?!
reviews.author: Peter Pangelinan

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: Only offers exist in Maryland, uninstalled.
reviews.author: Antonio Travers

reviews.title: False advertising.
reviews.comment: This is ONLY for the Baltimore area, that needs to be more apparent.  You really need to roll this out nationwide!
reviews.author: Christel Trulson

reviews.title: What\'s so special about Baltimore?
reviews.comment: I use a similar up for Papa John\'s, so far I have been very satisfied. I did have one problem and it was resolved with a phone call which resulted in a free pizza. You might wonder why I\'m talking about Papa John\'s, the point is I\'m loyal. Burger King could have that loyalty as well (as long as I don\'t want pizza) except that I live in Florida.....
reviews.author: Bobby West

reviews.title: not available in my area yet
reviews.comment: says currently only available in the baltimore area so check back soon maybe thats why its not working for anyone
reviews.author: Nicole Barr

reviews.comment: nobody knows about this.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pointless
reviews.comment: This is pointless. The code doesn\'t even stay on the screen long enough to show an employee and on top of that every burger king I went to said they don\'t accept it. You also lose points even if the code is not used. Just openening the code makes it invalid n you lose the points. Do not even waste your time with this frustrating app.
reviews.author: Chelsea Erb

reviews.title: Didn\'t work
reviews.comment: I tried in near Fort Bragg, NC and it did not work. The manager would not except the code for one free item. I could have just had a complete moron though because it is NC
reviews.author: Meghan Cooney
